nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING EXTENDED NORTHWARD ALONG THE TEXAS COAST... ...HEAVY RAINFALL, COASTAL FLOODING, AND GUSTY WINDS EXPECTED ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO THROUGH THURSDAY...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM WARNING EXTENDED NORTHWARD ALONG THE TEXAS COAST... ...HEAVY RAINFALL, COASTAL FLOODING, AND GUSTY WINDS EXPECTED ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO THROUGH THURSDAY...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Tue Jun 18
 the center of One was located near 22.1, -92.7
 with movement N at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
